values.content:
=Create an eBay product title (MAXIMUM 80 characters) for this auto part:

Original Title: {{ $('Code5').first().json.title }}
Category: {{ $('Code5').first().json.categoryName }}
Part Number: {{ $('Code5').first().json.partNumber }}

Requirements:
- Must be 80 characters or less
- Keep the inch size (e.g., 12") from original title
- Use "Compatible" before vehicle info (e.g., "Compatible Honda Civic 2016-2021")
- Keep the most important keywords
- Make it SEO-friendly for eBay search

Return ONLY the title, nothing else.
